channel.title: Julia on Optionally Bayes
channel.description: Recent content in Julia on Optionally Bayes

item.title: Integer Programming for Daily Fantasy Sports
item.description: Using Integer Programming to find Daily Fantasy Sports lineups with the highest expected points.

item.title: Decomposing Volatility: Continuous and Jump Component
item.description: Illustrating how realized volatility can decomposed into a continuous and jump component, providing new modelling opportunities.

item.title: Exploring the Kelly Criterion: The Multi-Period Problem
item.description: Exploring how mean-variance methods and the Kelly Criterion compare in multi-period investments

item.title: Exploring the Kelly Criterion: Drawdown
item.description: Exploring the Kelly Criterion and its drawdown properties using Monte Carlo
